content.text: How do we protect our intellectual property as a startup?
Secure your patents, trademarks, and copyrights. Have Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs) in place and iron-clad employment agreements. Document *everything*!
What are the key legal considerations when hiring our first employees?
Proper employment agreements, including clauses on confidentiality, non-compete, and intellectual property assignment. Avoid misclassifying them as contractors if they arenâ€™t.
